name: Intel 62205ANHMWDTX1 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Security: WPA, WPA2, 802.1X(EAP-TLS, TTLS, PEAP, LEAP, EAP-FAST), EAP-SIM, EAP-AKA, PAP, CHAP, TLS, GTC, MS-CHAP, MS-CHAPv2
Antenna: Two element unified antenna with 4 foot (~1.2M) cable
Features: [Architecture: Infrastructure and SoftAP, Encryption: 64-bit and 128-bit WEP, AES-CCMP, TKIP, Wi-Fi Direct Encryption & Authentication: WPA2, AES-CCMP, Intel Technology Support: Intel Wireless Display, Intel My WiFi Technology, Intel Smart Connect Technology, Intel PRO/Set Wireless software]
